titles.title: Responsible Farming Act of 2012
Responsible Farming Act of 2012
To repeal the conservation stewardship program of the Department of Agriculture.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Energy, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
Responsible Farming Act of 2012 - Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to repeal the conservation stewardship program.
States that such repeal shall not be construed to affect the terms and conditions of any stewardship contract that was entered into on or before the date of enactment of this Act.
